import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../../Context/AuthContext'; const Checkout = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [step, setStep] = useState(1); const [shippingDetails, setShippingDetails] = useState({ firstName: user?.name?.split(' ')[0] || '', lastName: user?.name?.split(' ').slice(1).join(' ') || '', email: user?.email || '', phone: user?.phone || '', address: user?.address || '', city: '', state: '', zipCode: '', country: 'Sri Lanka' }); const [orderSummary] = useState({ items: [ { name: 'RO Membrane Filter', quantity: 2, price: 299.99 }, { name: '5L Water Bottle', quantity: 5, price: 2.99 }, { name: 'Sediment Filter Cartridge', quantity: 1, price: 19.99 } ], subtotal: 629.95, discount: 99.99, shipping: 10.00, total: 540.96 }); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setShippingDetails(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleConfirmShipping = () => { // Validate required fields const requiredFields = ['firstName', 'lastName', 'email', 'phone', 'address', 'city', 'state', 'zipCode']; const missingFields = requiredFields.filter(field => !shippingDetails[field]); if (missingFields.length > 0) { alert('Please fill in all required fields'); return; } setStep(2); }; const handleProceedToPayment = () => { navigate('/payment', { state: { shippingDetails, orderSummary } }); }; const handleBackToShipping = () => { setStep(1); }; return (
{/* Header */}

Checkout

Complete your purchase

= 1 ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white' : 'bg-gray-200 text-gray-500' }`}> 1
= 2 ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white' : 'bg-gray-200 text-gray-500' }`}> 2
= 3 ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white' : 'bg-gray-200 text-gray-500' }`}> 3
{/* Main Content */}
{step === 1 && (

Shipping Information

)} {step === 2 && (

Order Confirmation

Shipping Details

Name:

{shippingDetails.firstName} {shippingDetails.lastName}

Email:

{shippingDetails.email}

Phone:

{shippingDetails.phone}

Address:

{shippingDetails.address}

City:

{shippingDetails.city}

State:

{shippingDetails.state}

ZIP Code:

{shippingDetails.zipCode}

Country:

{shippingDetails.country}

Order Items

{orderSummary.items.map((item, index) => (

{item.name}

Quantity: {item.quantity}

${(item.price * item.quantity).toFixed(2)}

))}
)}
{/* Order Summary Sidebar */}

Order Summary

{orderSummary.items.map((item, index) => (
{item.name} {item.quantity} ${(item.price * item.quantity).toFixed(2)}
))}
Subtotal ${orderSummary.subtotal.toFixed(2)}
Discount -${orderSummary.discount.toFixed(2)}
Shipping ${orderSummary.shipping.toFixed(2)}
Total ${orderSummary.total.toFixed(2)}
Secure checkout
); }; export default Checkout;
